flawed_nl_solution:
Sylvia got 50/5 = <<50/5=10>>10 incorrect answers.
This means she got 50 - 10 = <<50-10=41>>41 correct answers.
Sergio got 50 - 4 = <<50-4=46>>46 correct answers.
So, Sergio got 46 - 41 = <<46-41=5>>5 more correct answers than Sylvia.
